pattern: No real time data received recently
title: WebSocket Connection Issue
description: This may indicate a WebSocket connection issue, often resulting in greyed-out messages or lack of real-time updates.
solution: Ensure that your server supports WebSockets and check any reverse proxy configurations (e.g., Nginx, Apache) to properly forward WebSocket connections. Verify network stability and restart the server if needed.

title: Network Request Failed in Mobile App
description: This error often occurs in mobile apps due to network issues, SSL certificate problems, or proxy misconfigurations.
solution: Verify that your server's SSL certificate is valid and trusted, ensure the server is reachable from the mobile device, and check for any interfering proxies or firewalls.

title: API Server Contact Error
description: This indicates an issue with contacting the API server, commonly due to incorrect configuration.
solution: Check the API URL in your configuration. Ensure the port and protocol (http/https) are correct and the server is running.

pattern: http request to a https server
title: Protocol Mismatch Error
description: There is a protocol mismatch when sending requests, often after server upgrades or configuration changes.
solution: Update your configuration to use the correct protocol, likely HTTPS if your server is secured. Restart the server after changes.

title: Workspace Read-Only Mode
description: The workspace is in read-only mode, typically due to disconnection from Rocket.Chat cloud services.
solution: Your workspace needs to be connected to the Rocket.Chat cloud. Admins can restore functionality by registering or connecting to the cloud service.

title: URL Validation Failure
description: URL validation fails after domain changes or misconfigurations.
solution: After changing domains, ensure all site URL settings in Rocket.Chat are updated. Restart the server after changes.

title: Parse Error in OAuth
description: Parse error in OAuth setups, often due to endpoint mismatches.
solution: In OAuth setups, this can occur if the endpoint returns HTML instead of JSON. Verify the OAuth callback URLs and endpoints are correct.

title: MongoDB Connection Failure
description: Failed to connect to MongoDB, commonly from credential or network issues.
solution: Verify MongoDB credentials, network connectivity, and that the MongoDB service is running. Check for firewall restrictions.

title: Undefined Error in UI
description: Undefined error related to UI loading issues.
solution: This may relate to loading issues in the UI. Clear browser cache, check server logs for related errors, and ensure all assets (e.g., main.js) are accessible.

title: Failure to Reach Cloud Service
description: Unable to reach cloud.rocket.chat, often due to network blocks or server issues.
solution: Your server may be blocked by a firewall or blacklist. Test connectivity to cloud.rocket.chat and consider using a different IP or contacting support.

title: Out of Memory Error
description: Server crashes or stops due to insufficient memory, often after adding swap or on low-RAM setups.
solution: 1. Upgrade to at least 2GB RAM. 2. Disable unnecessary services like snapd. 3. Monitor resource usage and optimize MongoDB caching.

title: Audio Recordings Not Loading
description: Audio recordings fail to load randomly in the mobile app, leading to app freezes or crashes.
solution: 1. Switch proxy to Nginx and disable keepalive. 2. Convert m4a files to mp3 using ffmpeg (e.g., ffmpeg -v 5 -i input.m4a -acodec libmp3lame -ac 2 -y output.mp3). 3. Report as a bug to the React Native repository if persists.

title: App Marketplace Connection Error
description: Unable to connect to the App Marketplace despite active internet and cloud registration.
solution: Upgrade Rocket.Chat to version 6.6.x or higher. If on Raspberry Pi, check for compatible snaps or use alternative deployment.

title: Stability Issue with User Reconnections
description: High CPU/RAM load and unavailability when many users disconnect and reconnect simultaneously.
solution: 1. Temporarily enable 'Disable Presence Broadcast' in settings to stabilize. 2. Optimize presence handling in code or scale instances. 3. Ensure oplog is enabled in MongoDB replicaset.

title: Random Phantom Notifications
description: Random notifications (e.g., 'ding dong' sounds) occur without new messages or invites.
solution: 1. Update to the latest Rocket.Chat version. 2. Check for conflicting browser extensions or app settings. 3. If persists, report as a bug on GitHub with reproduction steps.

title: Invalid Workspace URL Error
description: Occurs on Android devices when using the mobile app, often related to configuration mismatches.
solution: Verify the workspace URL in the app settings and server configuration. Ensure consistency between server Site_URL and app connections. Update the app if outdated.

pattern: (?i)Too many login attempts|Too Frequent Login errors
title: Too Frequent Login Errors
description: Users encounter login failures due to rate limiting or credential issues on new installations.
solution: Check for rate limiting in server settings. Verify user credentials and consider resetting passwords. If persistent, review authentication plugins or LDAP configurations.

title: Notifications Failure
description: Push or email notifications stop working, often after version updates or cloud disconnections.
solution: Update to the latest version (e.g., 7.x). Reconnect to Rocket.Chat cloud services. Verify push gateway configurations and test notification settings.

title: Meteor Runtime Config Error
description: Error during server startup or page loading, leading to stuck home pages or 404 errors.
solution: Check for missing resources like main.js. Ensure proper installation and restart the server. If using snaps, refresh and verify dependencies.

title: URI Malformed Error
description: Occurs in logs or during media loading, often in containerized setups like Docker.
solution: Update to the latest Rocket.Chat version. Verify container configurations and check for encoding issues in URLs or media files.
